notes.equation: \overrightarrow{F_{12}} = \frac{kq_{1}q_{2}}{r^2}\hat{r}\\\mbox{Where }\overrightarrow{F_{12}}\mbox{ is the force }q_{1}\mbox{ exerts on }q_{2}\\k \mbox{ is a }\linkNote{11.2}{constant}\mbox{.}\\\hat{r}\mbox{ is the normal of the direction between the charges.}
\mbox{The net charge in a closed system is constant.}

\Phi_E = \overrightarrow{E} \cdot \overrightarrow{A} = EA\cos(\theta)\\\Phi_E = \int^{}_{surface}{\overrightarrow{E} \cdot d\overrightarrow{A}}\\\mbox{Where } \overrightarrow{A} \mbox{ is the outward pointing normal to the surface and has the magnitude of the surface's area.}
